bio:treatment.description: Plants green. Branch leaves with distal leaves erect-spreading to spreading and widest distally, lanceolate-oblong to ovate-lanceolate, 1.5–3 mm; margins denticulate proximally as projecting cell ends, entire distally; apex acute, ending in long, linear, fragile subula; costa prominent, vanishing in subula, or often ending near apex in proximal leaves; distal laminal cells irregularly rounded to elliptic-hexagonal, 3–6 µm. Sexual condition dioicous, male plants similar to female; perigonia terminal. Seta 5–11 mm. Capsule oblong- to short-cylindric, 2.2–3.5 mm. Spores isosporous, 22–32 µm.
